/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a park, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. A winding path, like a ribbon, meanders through the park, inviting visitors to explore its tranquil beauty. The path is bordered by lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the ground. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the vast expanse. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking up at the towering trees, creating a sense of awe and grandeur. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
